name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #わため3D重大告知 】わため史上たぶん最大で最強の告知！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [VYk1zdGfPzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Watame says goodbye to a guest (Botan, using a deep voice persona) and accidentally almost fires her weapon while waving.
Watame ponders the meaning of the number '6' on the notice board and then receives a mysterious transmission through her horns.
A video message from Calliope Mori plays, praising Watame and challenging her to a one-minute English self-introduction.
Watame prepares for the English challenge by equipping star-shaped sunglasses and a giant axe to mimic Calliope.
Watame performs her English self-introduction challenge, mentioning her hobbies and things she likes.
Calliope reappears to congratulate Watame on her English and gives her the next keyword: 'I'.
Watame adds the letter 'I' to the notice board next to the '6' and reflects on the mystery.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ぼたん神様ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you, Goddess Botan!

subtitles.original: それじゃあわしはこの辺で。またな。
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll be off now. See ya.

subtitles.original: またな！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: またな！あぶ･･･あぶないあぶない。
subtitles.english: See ya! Whoa... careful, careful.

subtitles.original: あぶね、あぶね。
subtitles.english: That was close.

subtitles.original: なんだろうね？ぼたんちゃんありがとう。
subtitles.english: I wonder what it is? Thanks, Botan-chan.

subtitles.original: 『６』ってなんだろうね？
subtitles.english: I wonder what '6' is for?

subtitles.original: とりあえずこの装備外しておこうかな。物騒だからね。
subtitles.english: Anyway, let's take this equipment off. It's dangerous.

subtitles.original: みんな分かる？なんだろうね？
subtitles.english: Do you guys know? I wonder what it is.

subtitles.original: え、まさか６期生？
subtitles.english: Eh, could it be the 6th generation?

subtitles.original: いや、わためがそんな重大な･･･
subtitles.english: No, for Watame to have such a major...

subtitles.original: あ、なんだ？角で何か動画を受信したぞ！ビビビビビビ･･･
subtitles.english: Oh, what's this? I've received a video through my horns! Beep beep beep...

subtitles.original: なんだ？
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: わため先輩、こんばんドドド！Hololive English Myth's Calliope Mori here.
subtitles.english: Watame-senpai, konban-do-do-do! Hololive English Myth's Calliope Mori here.

subtitles.original: 先輩、元気ですか？
subtitles.english: Senpai, how are you?

subtitles.original: うわ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: 今は私ね、旅行中ですが、今夜わため先輩にお会いしたいと思いました。
subtitles.english: I'm traveling right now, but I wanted to see you tonight, Watame-senpai.

subtitles.original: わため先輩の歌声、すごく素敵だよ。
subtitles.english: Watame-senpai, your singing voice is wonderful.

subtitles.original: 最高の音楽、ありがとうございます。いつも聴いていますよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you for the great music. I'm always listening.

subtitles.original: よかったらぜひまたコラボしたいよね。
subtitles.english: I'd love to collab with you again if you're up for it.

subtitles.original: その時まで、私ね、わため先輩の活動をよく見るつもりです。
subtitles.english: Until then, I'm planning to keep a close eye on your activities, Watame-senpai.

subtitles.original: よろしくね。
subtitles.english: Looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: かわいい！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: 私からのチャレンジをクリアできたら、キーワードを教えてあげます。
subtitles.english: If you can clear my challenge, I'll give you a keyword.

subtitles.original: チャレンジは、今から１分間英語で自己紹介と趣味と
subtitles.english: The challenge is, for one minute starting now, introduce yourself and your hobbies in English,

subtitles.original: 自分の好きなことを語ってください。
subtitles.english: and talk about the things you like.

subtitles.original: 日本語を使ったら、アウトですよ。
subtitles.english: If you use Japanese, you're out.

subtitles.original: それでは、わため先輩、頑張ってください！
subtitles.english: Well then, Watame-senpai, good luck!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: えええー！
subtitles.english: Eeeeh?!

subtitles.original: カリオピちゃんありがとう！ありがとうだけど･･･
subtitles.english: Kalliopi-chan, thank you! Thank you, but...

subtitles.original: 英語で何か言ってって言ってたね。やってみようか。
subtitles.english: She said to say something in English. Shall I try?

subtitles.original: もうチャレンジしてみようかな。
subtitles.english: I guess I'll take on the challenge.

subtitles.original: あ、そうや。でもねわためもちょっとラッパーぽい･･･
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right. But you know, Watame is also a bit of a rapper...

subtitles.original: イヨ、イヨ！
subtitles.english: Yo, yo!

subtitles.original: イヨ、サングラス持ってるからこれつけてもいい？いい？コスプレ、コスプレしてもいい？
subtitles.english: Yo, I have sunglasses, so can I wear them? Is it okay? Can I do a cosplay?

subtitles.original: ちょっとつけるわ。
subtitles.english: I'll put them on.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、あの、カマなかったから斧でもいいかな？あはは。
subtitles.english: Well, since I didn't have a scythe, maybe an axe is okay? Haha.

subtitles.original: カマなかったから、ちょ斧で頑張る。
subtitles.english: Since I didn't have a scythe, I'll do my best with this axe.

subtitles.original: ちょっとカリオピちゃんをイメージして頑張ります。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best by channeling my inner Kalliopi-chan.

subtitles.original: では･･･
subtitles.english: Well then...

subtitles.original: チャレンジスタート！
subtitles.english: Challenge start!

subtitles.original: My name is Watame Tsunomaki.
subtitles.english: My name is Watame Tsunomaki.

subtitles.original: And... uh... uh... My...
subtitles.english: And... uh... uh... My...

subtitles.original: My hobby is... My hobby is...
subtitles.english: My hobby is... My hobby is...

subtitles.original: Uh, share happy. Share happy equal food, food!
subtitles.english: Uh, share happy. Share happy equals food, food!

subtitles.original: Food meshitero, yeah!
subtitles.english: Food meshitero, yeah!

subtitles.original: Meshitero, yeah!
subtitles.english: Meshitero, yeah!

subtitles.original: I like sing a song.
subtitles.english: I like sing a song.

subtitles.original: I like sing a song... and funny dance.
subtitles.english: I like sing a song... and funny dance.

subtitles.original: Funny dance.
subtitles.english: Funny dance.

subtitles.original: Funny dance... and...
subtitles.english: Funny dance... and...

subtitles.original: I like apple. I like pineapple.
subtitles.english: I like apple. I like pineapple.

subtitles.original: I like Pen-Pineapple-Apple-Pen! Yeah!
subtitles.english: I like Pen-Pineapple-Apple-Pen! Yeah!

subtitles.original: I like... I like... game.
subtitles.english: I like... I like... games.

subtitles.original: And stream, yeah!
subtitles.english: And streaming, yeah!

subtitles.original: Good morning mada stream, yeah!
subtitles.english: Good morning mada stream, yeah!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい、パーペク！はい、完ペク！
subtitles.english: Yes, perfect! Yes, flawless!

subtitles.original: これクリアだよね？ね？
subtitles.english: I cleared it, right? Right?

subtitles.original: Hello, hello again! Wow! Nice job, senpai! 英語上手！
subtitles.english: Hello, hello again! Wow! Nice job, senpai! You're good at English!

subtitles.original: Your English is really great. You are amazing.
subtitles.english: Your English is really great. You are amazing.

subtitles.original: I want to teach you English someday.
subtitles.english: I want to teach you English someday.

subtitles.original: Please help me with my Japanese.
subtitles.english: Please help me with my Japanese.

subtitles.original: それでは、キーワードのプレゼントです。
subtitles.english: Now then, here is your keyword gift.

subtitles.original: キーワードは『Ｉ』です。
subtitles.english: The keyword is 'I'.

subtitles.original: 先輩またね！頑張って！
subtitles.english: Senpai, see you later! Good luck!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: 英語の『Ｉ』！
subtitles.english: The English 'I'!

subtitles.original: 数字の次は英語か。謎だな。
subtitles.english: After a number, it's an English letter. It's a mystery.

subtitles.original: わからない。６と『Ｉ』、なんだろうね？
subtitles.english: I don't know. '6' and 'I', I wonder what they mean?

subtitles.original: カリオピちゃんありがとうね！なんか今回ね、角で受信できるようになりました。
subtitles.english: Thank you, Kalliopi-chan! Somehow, I can receive transmissions through my horns now.
